title: Could an eye doctor diagnose Alzheimer's before you have symptoms?

title_detail.value: Could an eye doctor diagnose Alzheimer's before you have symptoms?

summary: A study of more than 200 people suggests the loss of blood vessels in the retina could signal Alzheimer's disease.

summary_detail.value: A study of more than 200 people suggests the loss of blood vessels in the retina could signal Alzheimer's disease.
